topIssues.title: feat: Add JSON API endpoints for summaries
topIssues.author: madjin
topIssues.body:
## Summary

Extend the static JSON API to include summary endpoints alongside the existing leaderboard endpoints.

## Current State

We have leaderboard API endpoints working:
- `/data/api/leaderboard-monthly.json`
- `/data/api/leaderboard-weekly.json`
- `/data/api/leaderboard-lifetime.json`

## Proposed Summary API Endpoints

Export all historical summaries as structured JSON:

```
/data/api/summaries/overall/{interval}/{date}.json
/data/api/summaries/repos/{owner}/{repo}/{interval}/{date}.json
/data/api/summaries/contributors/{username}/{interval}/{date}.json
```

### Response Structure

```typescript
interface SummaryAPIResponse {
  version: "1.0";
  type: "overall" | "repository" | "contributor";
  interval: "day" | "week" | "month";
  date: string;           // YYYY-MM-DD
  generatedAt: string;    // ISO timestamp
  content: string;        // Markdown content
}
```

## Implementation Plan

### Shared Infrastructure
Create `src/lib/pipelines/export/apiHelpers.ts` with:
- `APIResponseBase` interface (version, generatedAt)
- `writeAPIResponse()` function
- `calculateDateRange()` (extract from leaderboard)

### Files to Create/Modify
1. `src/lib/pipelines/export/apiHelpers.ts` - New shared utilities
2. `src/lib/pipelines/export/exportLeaderboardAPI.ts` - Simplify (remove pagination, keep totalUsers)
3. `src/lib/pipelines/export/exportSummaryAPI.ts` - New file
4. `cli/analyze-pipeline.ts` - Add `export-summaries` command
5. `.github/workflows/deploy.yml` - Add export step
6. `README.md` - Document all API endpoints

## Additional Changes

- **Simplify leaderboard API**: Remove pagination object, keep just `totalUsers` (pagination doesn't make sense for static JSON files)

## Questions to Discuss

- Should we include index files listing all available summaries?
- Any additional metadata to include in the response?
- Rate of export - all summaries on every deploy, or incremental?

---

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

topPRs.title: feat: add JSON leaderboard API endpoints
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
# Add JSON Leaderboard API Endpoints

## Summary

This PR adds static JSON API endpoints for leaderboard data, enabling external applications, mobile apps, and third-party integrations to consume leaderboard information programmatically.

## Features

- **Three time periods**: Monthly, weekly, and lifetime leaderboards
- **Comprehensive scoring**: Includes total score plus breakdown by contribution type (PR, issue, review, comment)
- **Wallet addresses**: Includes Solana and Ethereum wallet addresses from GitHub profiles
- **Calendar-based periods**: 
  - Weekly: Sunday to today
  - Monthly: 1st of month to today
  - Lifetime: Project start date to today
- **CLI command**: `bun run pipeline export-leaderboard`
- **CI/CD integration**: Automatically generates fresh leaderboard data on every deployment
- **Full test coverage**: 9 comprehensive tests covering all scenarios

## API Endpoints

The following static JSON files will be available via GitHub Pages:

- `/data/api/leaderboard-monthly.json`
- `/data/api/leaderboard-weekly.json`
- `/data/api/leaderboard-lifetime.json`

## Response Format

```json
{
  "period": "monthly",
  "startDate": "2025-10-01",
  "endDate": "2025-10-23",
  "generatedAt": "2025-10-23T11:12:25.933Z",
  "totalUsers": 150,
  "leaderboard": [
    {
      "rank": 1,
      "username": "contributor1",
      "avatarUrl": "https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/...",
      "score": 1234.5,
      "prScore": 800.0,
      "issueScore": 200.0,
      "reviewScore": 150.5,
      "commentScore": 84.0,
      "wallets": {
        "solana": "9xQeWvG816bUx9EPjHmaT23yvVM2ZWbrrpZb9PusVFin",
        "ethereum": "0x742d35Cc6634C0532925a3b844Bc9e7595f0bEb"
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

## Use Cases
- Mobile apps: Display leaderboard data in native applications
- Discord bots: Show contributor rankings and stats
- Analytics dashboards: Track contributor engagement over time
- Reward systems: Automate token distributions based on rankings
- Third-party integrations: Enable community-built tools and services

## Testing
All tests pass successfully:
- bun test src/lib/pipelines/export/exportLeaderboardAPI.test.ts

topPRs.title: feat: add static JSON API for summaries
topPRs.author: madjin
topPRs.body:
## Summary

Extends the static JSON API with summary endpoints using a "piggyback" approach - generating JSON alongside markdown during summarization.

### Changes

- **Simplified Leaderboard API**: Removed unnecessary pagination fields (static files don't support URL params)
- **Extended fsHelpers**: Added `sha256`, path helpers, `writeJSONWithLatest`, `updateSummaryIndex`, and API types
- **Overall Summaries**: Now export JSON alongside markdown with `latest.json` and `index.json`
- **Repository Summaries**: Same JSON export for daily/weekly/monthly repo summaries
- **Contributor Summaries**: Added both markdown (was missing!) and JSON export
- **New CLI Command**: `export-summaries` for backfilling JSON from existing DB data
- **Documentation**: Comprehensive API docs in README

### API Structure

```
/data/api/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ leaderboard-monthly.json
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ leaderboard-weekly.json
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ leaderboard-lifetime.json
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ summaries/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ overall/{interval}/{date}.json, latest.json, index.json
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ repos/{owner}_{repo}/{interval}/{date}.json, latest.json, index.json
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ contributors/{username}/{interval}/{date}.json, latest.json, index.json
```

### Response Features

- `contentHash` (sha256) for cache validation
- `sourceLastUpdated` for tracking freshness
- `latest.json` pointers for easy access to most recent summary
- `index.json` for listing all available summaries per interval

## Test plan

- [ ] Run `bun run check` - passes lint and type checks
- [ ] Run `bun run pipeline summarize -t overall --days 1` - generates JSON alongside markdown
- [ ] Run `bun run pipeline export-summaries --dry-run` - shows what would be exported
- [ ] Verify JSON structure matches documented schema

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Documentation**
  * Added comprehensive API documentation for Leaderboard and Summary endpoints, including request/response schemas and export instructions.

* **New Features**
  * Added new `export-summaries` CLI command to export summaries in JSON API format with configurable types, intervals, and dry-run mode support.
  * Summary data now exported in both Markdown and JSON API formats with versioned artifacts and latest-link pointers.

* **Changes**
  * Leaderboard API responses simplified by removing pagination metadata.

<sub>‚úèÔ∏è Tip: You can customize this high-level summary in your review settings.</sub>

topPRs.title: feat: add static JSON leaderboard API endpoints
topPRs.author: madjin
topPRs.body:
## Summary

- Adds static JSON API endpoints for leaderboard data at `/data/api/leaderboard-{period}.json`
- Includes API versioning (v1.0) for future compatibility
- Adds pagination metadata (limit, offset, hasMore)
- Uses `config.contributionStartDate` for lifetime period (fork-friendly)
- Includes wallet addresses (users opt-in via GitHub profile README)
- Excludes bot accounts from rankings

**API Endpoints:**
- `/data/api/leaderboard-monthly.json`
- `/data/api/leaderboard-weekly.json`
- `/data/api/leaderboard-lifetime.json`

**CLI Command:**
```bash
bun run pipeline export-leaderboard [--limit N] [--output-dir DIR]
```

## Test plan

- [x] Run `bun run pipeline export-leaderboard --output-dir=./data/` locally
- [x] Verify JSON files are created with correct structure
- [ ] Verify wallets are included for users who have opted in
- [ ] Deploy and verify endpoints are accessible

## Related

Supersedes #164 with additional improvements:
- API versioning for future compatibility
- Pagination metadata
- Fork-friendly configuration (uses `contributionStartDate` from config instead of hardcoded date)
- Resolved merge conflict with recent CLI changes

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

topContributors.summary: madjin: Focused on enhancing the `elizaos.github.io` repository by implementing new static JSON API endpoints for summaries and leaderboards, as evidenced by merged PRs #186 (+966/-412 lines) and #184 (+402/-0 lines), while also contributing to other work, bug fixes, and feature development across 35 files.

odilitime: Focused on feature development, successfully merging PR elizaos-plugins/plugin-discord#33 which added a tiered permission system for bot invite URLs, demonstrating a primary focus on bugfix work, other work, and feature work across 81 files.

wtfsayo: Focused on enhancing the registry's robustness by merging PR elizaos-plugins/registry#244, which introduced detection and fixes for version/core dependency mismatches, contributing to bugfix and other work across 2 files with 2 commits.
